h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Battle - Red Loong
content: If you find yourself struggling to hit the pots, make sure you attack him when he’s stunned where his back is facing, and not his belly, as you’ll get a better angle that way. You can also quickly take a Tiger Subduing Pellet right when he becomes stunned to maximize your damage output on his weak point.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Red_Loong.md', within the main section titled 'Red Loong', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Battle - Red Loong'.
The content is as follows:
If you find yourself struggling to hit the pots, make sure you attack him when he’s stunned where his back is facing, and not his belly, as you’ll get a better angle that way. You can also quickly take a Tiger Subduing Pellet right when he becomes stunned to maximize your damage output on his weak point.
